entry.data:
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
